S02bsu015_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca /
S02bsu015_u:3: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrastreṇa parivṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
S02bsu015_u:4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaekānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat /
S02bsu015_u:5: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ kalpakoṭībhirbhāṣitam /
S02bsu015_u:6_0: ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśamanāya
S02bsu015_u:7_0: nāhaṃ bhagavan samanupaśyāmi [Em_36] sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S02bsu015_u:7_1: prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigrahe śāntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare
S02bsu015_u:7_2: śastraparihare viṣaprahāṇe kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikramet na praśamet nedaṃsthānaṃ vidyate
S02bsu015_u:8: tadasya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:10: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍapratihataraṅgavelakiraṇarājasya nāma tathāgatasya /
S02bsu015_u:12: saha pratilaṃbhena daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatāḥ [Em_37] sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02bsu015_u:13: evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavyam /
S02bsu015_u:23: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:32: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S02bsu015_u:35: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvasmin karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ [Em_38] pratilabdham /
S02bsu015_u:36: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi /
S02bsu015_u:37: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittān dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S02bsu015_u:39: ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti /
S02bsu015_u:43: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati /
S02bsu015_u:45: tena nāmadheyamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so 'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutśatasahasrātirekasamam /
S02bsu015_u:51: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā /
S02bsu015_u:52: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum /
S02bsu015_u:55: tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma /

S02bsu015_u:92: namo ratnatrayāya nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
